lines.text: [last lines]

[after managing to prevent the plane from crashing]
Whew... lucky for me this thing had air brakes!

[exploring the plane]
Wow... it's the Grand Central Station with wings.

[robbing a bank]
Haw haw! And keep reachin' for the ceiling till ya reach it!

[singing as he flies the plane]
You're off for the big show tonight, so fly from wing to wing...

[rushing into the cockpit]
I'm a-takin' over this flyin' machine! Gimme that wheel!
Well, if you insist.
[he yanks the steering wheel out and throws it out the plane's window]

[as he and Sam watch the robot pilot parachute off the plane]
Gee, that leaves only one parachute. We'll have to draw straws to see who gets it.
Okay, you draw the straws.
[he rushes back to get the last parachute, then reappears]
I'm a-takin' the parachute!
[jumps off]
Geronimo!

[reading book, "How to Fly"]
"Refer to page 5, illustration E..."
Quick, quick! Do something, or we're gonna crash! Read faster, rabbit! Read faster, or I'll blast your head off!

[closing the book]
I refuse to look up any more reference because you talked mean to me. Say you're sorry.

[smacking forehead]
Oh, no!
[Sam runs to the window, and sees that the plane is plummeting to Earth very quickly]
Okay, you crazy galoot, I'm sorry.
Say you're sorry with sugar on it.

[indignantly]
No! No! *Never*!

[pause]
Okay.

[Sam nervously begins playing with a yo-yo and jacks, while Bugs calmly chews on a carrot. Eventually, Sam returns to the window and sees to his horror that the plane is just about to crash toward farmland]

[frantically]
I'm sorry with sugar on it!
That's better. *Much* better. I'll see what I can do.
YAAAAAH!
[Bugs manages to get the plane back up before it nosedives]

[after he gets the plane back up right after the nosedive]
I guess that was it. I guess I'd better phone the authorities that I'm bringing the ship back.
